title: Cinnamomum tamala
Chemical Constituents: Î±-pinene, camphene, myrcene, limonene, eugenol, p-cymene, methyl eugenol, and eugenol acetate and methyl ether of eugenol
Therapeutic uses: Used for bad odor from mouth, black spots on the face, dental caries, swelling, cough and in complications of tuberculosis.
